inputSchema.title: AddAssetAssociationRequest

assetId.title: Asset Id
assetId.description: The unique identifier of the asset to be associated with the campaign. This ID is specific to the `assetType` (e.g., a form ID, list ID, or external URL ID).

assetType.title: Asset Type
assetType.description: Type of asset to associate with the campaign. Supported types: 'FORM', 'OBJECT_LIST' (Static List), 'EXTERNAL_WEB_URL' (External Website Page).

campaignGuid.title: Campaign Guid
campaignGuid.description: The unique identifier (UUID) of the HubSpot campaign to which the asset will be associated.

inputSchema.description: Request schema for associating an asset with a HubSpot marketing campaign.

tools.name: HUBSPOT_ADD_TOKEN_TO_EVENT_TEMPLATE
tools.description: Adds a new custom data token to an existing event template for a specified HubSpot application, optionally populating a CRM object property if objectPropertyName is provided.

inputSchema.title: AddTokenToEventTemplateRequest

name.title: Name
name.description: The internal name of the token, used for referencing it within templates. Must be unique for this event template. Allowed characters: alphanumeric, periods (.), dashes (-), or underscores (_).

type.title: Type
type.description: The data type of the token. Determines how the token's value is stored and validated.

appId.title: App Id
appId.description: Numeric identifier of the target application associated with the event template. Provided in the URL path.

label.title: Label
label.description: The user-facing label for the token. This label is used for list segmentation and in reporting.

items.title: OptionsRequest

label.title: Label
label.description: The user-facing display text for this option.

value.title: Value
value.description: The internal programmatic value associated with this option.

items.description: Represents a single choice in an enumeration token, consisting of a display label and an internal value.

options.title: Options
options.description: A list of options for the token, required and applicable only if the token `type` is 'enumeration'. Each option must have a 'label' and a 'value'.

createdAt.title: Created At
createdAt.description: The creation date and time of the event template token in ISO 8601 format (e.g., '2023-01-15T10:30:00Z'). This field is nullable and will be null if the template was created before February 18th, 2020.

updatedAt.title: Updated At
updatedAt.description: The date and time the event template token was last updated, in ISO 8601 format (e.g., '2023-01-16T14:45:00Z'). This field is nullable and will be null if the template was updated before February 18th, 2020.

eventTemplateId.title: Event Template Id
eventTemplateId.description: Unique identifier of the event template. Provided in the URL path.

objectPropertyName.title: Object Property Name
objectPropertyName.description: The name of an existing CRM object property (e.g., 'dealstage', 'lifecyclestage'). If provided, this token will populate the specified CRM object property associated with the event. This allows for building or updating CRM objects through the Timeline API.

inputSchema.description: Defines the data required to add a new token to an existing event template.

tools.name: HUBSPOT_CREATE_A_NEW_MARKETING_EMAIL
tools.description: Creates a new marketing email in HubSpot, allowing comprehensive configuration of content, recipients, sender details, A/B testing, scheduling, web version, and other settings; the internal `name` for the email is required.

inputSchema.title: CreateANewMarketingEmailRequest

name.title: Name
name.description: Internal name of the email, as displayed on the HubSpot email dashboard.

state.title: State
state.description: Current state of the email (e.g., DRAFT, SCHEDULED, PUBLISHED).

subject.title: Subject
examples: Check out our new product update!
subject.description: The subject line of the marketing email.

archived.title: Archived
archived.description: True if the email is archived (typically hidden from main dashboard view).

campaign.title: Campaign
campaign.description: ID (GUID) of the associated HubSpot campaign for tracking/reporting.

language.title: Language
language.description: Primary language of the email content.

publishDate.title: Publish Date
publishDate.description: Scheduled ISO 8601 date-time for email publication or sending.

subcategory.title: Subcategory
subcategory.description: Email subcategory for internal organization or specific types (e.g., 'newsletter').

activeDomain.title: Active Domain
activeDomain.description: Domain for sending the email; must be a connected and verified HubSpot sending domain.

rssData__url.title: Rss Data  Url
rssData__url.description: URL of the RSS feed for email content. Must be valid and accessible if using RSS features.

from__replyTo.title: From  Reply To
from__replyTo.description: Primary 'From' and reply-to email address, unless `from__customReplyTo` is used.

sendOnPublish.title: Send On Publish
sendOnPublish.description: True to send email immediately on publish; false to publish without sending until triggered/scheduled.

businessUnitId.title: Business Unit Id
businessUnitId.description: The ID of the business unit this email is associated with, if applicable.

from__fromName.title: From  From Name
from__fromName.description: Sender name appearing in the 'From' field of the received email.

rssData__timing.title: Rss Data  Timing
rssData__timing.description: A dictionary specifying the timing and scheduling details for sending RSS emails. Each key must map to a dictionary/object value, not a simple string. Example: {"dayOfWeek": {"value": "Tuesday"}, "time": {"hour": 9, "minute": 0}}.

testing__testId.title: Testing  Test Id
testing__testId.description: The unique identifier for the A/B test associated with this email.

content__widgets.title: Content  Widgets
content__widgets.description: Dictionary of widgets (e.g., text, images, CTAs) and their configurations for email content. Each key must map to a dictionary/object value, not a simple string. Example: {"widgetId": {"type": "text", "content": "Hello", "style": {...}}}.

feedbackSurveyId.title: Feedback Survey Id
feedbackSurveyId.description: The ID of the feedback survey linked to the email.

webversion__slug.title: Webversion  Slug
webversion__slug.description: Custom URL slug for the email's web version (e.g., 'july-newsletter').

testing__abStatus.title: Testing  Ab Status
testing__abStatus.description: Current A/B test status for this email (e.g., master, variant).

webversion__title.title: Webversion  Title
webversion__title.description: Browser tab title for the email's web version.

content__flexAreas.title: Content  Flex Areas
content__flexAreas.description: Dictionary defining content and layout of flexible, customizable areas in the email template. Each key must map to a dictionary/object value, not a simple string. Example: {"areaName": {"content": {...}, "layout": {...}}}.

webversion__domain.title: Webversion  Domain
webversion__domain.description: Domain for the email's web version; defaults to HubSpot domain if unspecified.

from__customReplyTo.title: From  Custom Reply To
from__customReplyTo.description: Custom reply-to email address, overrides main 'Reply To' if set.

rssData__blogLayout.title: Rss Data  Blog Layout
rssData__blogLayout.description: Specifies the layout to be used for the blog RSS email.

rssData__maxEntries.title: Rss Data  Max Entries
rssData__maxEntries.description: The maximum number of blog posts (RSS entries) to include in a single RSS email.

content__smartFields.title: Content  Smart Fields
content__smartFields.description: Dictionary of smart fields for email personalization based on contact properties. Each key must map to a dictionary/object value, not a simple string. Example: {"fieldName": {"value": "defaultValue", "conditions": {...}}}.

testing__hoursToWait.title: Testing  Hours To Wait
testing__hoursToWait.description: Hours to wait for A/B test results before sending the winning version to remaining recipients.

to__suppressGraymail.title: To  Suppress Graymail
to__suppressGraymail.description: True to not send to contacts identified by HubSpot as 'graymail' (low engagement).

content__templatePath.title: Content  Template Path
content__templatePath.description: Path to the email template in HubSpot Design Manager.

webversion__expiresAt.title: Webversion  Expires At
webversion__expiresAt.description: ISO 8601 date-time when the web version expires and becomes inaccessible.

rssData__blogEmailType.title: Rss Data  Blog Email Type
rssData__blogEmailType.description: The type of blog email, which determines send frequency (e.g., instant, daily, weekly).

rssData__hubspotBlogId.title: Rss Data  Hubspot Blog Id
rssData__hubspotBlogId.description: The ID of the HubSpot blog to be used for the RSS email.

to__limitSendFrequency.title: To  Limit Send Frequency
to__limitSendFrequency.description: True to apply HubSpot's send frequency limits, preventing over-mailing.

to__contactIds__exclude.title: To  Contact Ids  Exclude
to__contactIds__exclude.description: List of specific contact IDs to explicitly exclude, even if in included lists.

to__contactIds__include.title: To  Contact Ids  Include
to__contactIds__include.description: List of specific contact IDs to include as recipients.

testing__abSuccessMetric.title: Testing  Ab Success Metric
testing__abSuccessMetric.description: Metric (e.g., CLICKS_BY_OPENS) to determine the A/B test winning version.

content__plainTextVersion.title: Content  Plain Text Version
content__plainTextVersion.description: Plain text version of the email, for non-HTML clients or recipient preference.

content__widgetContainers.title: Content  Widget Containers
content__widgetContainers.description: Dictionary of widget containers for grouping and managing widgets in the email template. Each key must map to a dictionary/object value, not a simple string. Example: {"containerId": {"widgets": [...], "layout": {...}}}.

rssData__rssEntryTemplate.title: Rss Data  Rss Entry Template
rssData__rssEntryTemplate.description: The HTML template for formatting each individual RSS entry within the email.

testing__abTestPercentage.title: Testing  Ab Test Percentage
testing__abTestPercentage.description: Percentage of recipients in the A/B test group (e.g., 20 for 20%).

to__contactLists__exclude.title: To  Contact Lists  Exclude
to__contactLists__exclude.description: List of contact list IDs whose members to explicitly exclude. HubSpot contact list IDs are typically numeric strings (e.g., '12345', '67890'). Provide the numeric ID as a string.

to__contactLists__include.title: To  Contact Lists  Include
to__contactLists__include.description: List of contact list IDs whose members to include as recipients. HubSpot contact list IDs are typically numeric strings (e.g., '12345', '67890'). Provide the numeric ID as a string.

webversion__redirectToUrl.title: Webversion  Redirect To Url
webversion__redirectToUrl.description: Custom URL for redirect if web version link is expired/deactivated.

rssData__blogImageMaxWidth.title: Rss Data  Blog Image Max Width
rssData__blogImageMaxWidth.description: The maximum width for images included from the blog feed in the RSS email.

testing__abSamplingDefault.title: Testing  Ab Sampling Default
testing__abSamplingDefault.description: Default email version (master/variant) if A/B test is inconclusive after the test period.

webversion__metaDescription.title: Webversion  Meta Description
examples: Catch up on our latest news and offers in this month's newsletter.
webversion__metaDescription.description: Meta description for the web version, used by search engines.

content__themeSettingsValues.title: Content  Theme Settings Values
content__themeSettingsValues.description: Dictionary of theme settings values to customize email appearance. Each key must map to a dictionary/object value, not a simple string. Example: {"brandColor": {"value": "#0055CC"}, "fontFamily": {"name": "Arial"}}.

testing__abSampleSizeDefault.title: Testing  Ab Sample Size Default
testing__abSampleSizeDefault.description: Default email version (master/variant) if A/B test sample size is too small for significance.

webversion__redirectToPageId.title: Webversion  Redirect To Page Id
webversion__redirectToPageId.description: ID of a HubSpot page for redirect if web version link is expired/deactivated.

rssData__useHeadlineAsSubject.title: Rss Data  Use Headline As Subject
rssData__useHeadlineAsSubject.description: If true, the email subject will be automatically populated from the blog post headline for RSS emails.

subscriptionDetails__subscriptionId.title: Subscription Details  Subscription Id
subscriptionDetails__subscriptionId.description: ID of the specific subscription type (e.g., newsletter, product updates).

subscriptionDetails__officeLocationId.title: Subscription Details  Office Location Id
subscriptionDetails__officeLocationId.description: ID of the office location for CAN-SPAM compliance and personalization.

subscriptionDetails__preferencesGroupId.title: Subscription Details  Preferences Group Id
subscriptionDetails__preferencesGroupId.description: ID of the subscription preferences group for managing recipient preferences.

inputSchema.description: Request schema for `CreateANewMarketingEmail`

tools.name: HUBSPOT_CREATE_ASSOCIATION_FOR_OBJECT_TYPE
tools.description: Creates the *definition* (schema) of a new association in HubSpot, specifying how two CRM object types relate (not an actual link between records); any provided `name` must be unique for the `fromObjectTypeId` and `toObjectTypeId` pair.

inputSchema.title: CreateAssociationForObjectTypeRequest

name.title: Name
name.description: Optional, user-defined unique name for the new association type (e.g., 'contact_to_company_custom'). If not supplied, HubSpot may generate a default.

objectType.title: Object Type
objectType.description: Fully qualified name (e.g., 'contacts') or object type ID (e.g., '2-12345') of the primary object schema for which the new association type is being defined.

toObjectTypeId.title: To Object Type Id
toObjectTypeId.description: Object type ID or fully qualified name (e.g., 'companies' or '0-2') for the 'to' side of the new association type, defining the target object in the relationship.

fromObjectTypeId.title: From Object Type Id
fromObjectTypeId.description: Object type ID or fully qualified name (e.g., 'contacts' or '0-1') for the 'from' side of the new association type, defining the origin object in the relationship.

inputSchema.description: Request schema for `CreateAssociationForObjectType`

tools.name: HUBSPOT_CREATE_BATCH_OF_CONTACTS
tools.description: DEPRECATED: Please use 'CREATE_CONTACTS' instead.

inputSchema.title: CreateBatchOfContactsRequest

items.title: InputsRequest

zip.title: Zip
zip.description: The contact's postal code or ZIP code.

city.title: City
city.description: The city where the contact resides.

email.title: Email
email.description: The primary email address of the contact. This is a unique identifier for contacts in HubSpot.

state.title: State
state.description: The state or region where the contact resides.

address.title: Address
address.description: The contact's street address, including apartment or unit number.

company.title: Company
company.description: The name of the company the contact works for.

country.title: Country
country.description: The country where the contact resides.

website.title: Website
website.description: The URL of the contact's personal or company website.

items.title: AssociationsRequest

to.title: To

id.title: Id
id.description: The unique identifier of the CRM object (e.g., company ID, deal ID) to which the new contact will be associated.

to.description: The target CRM object to associate with the new contact.

items.title: TypesRequest

associationTypeId.title: Association Type Id
associationTypeId.description: The unique ID of the association type, defining the nature of the link (e.g., contact to company).

associationCategory.title: Association Category
associationCategory.description: The category of the association. HubSpot-defined associations are default and cannot be deleted. User-defined associations are custom associations created by users. Integrator-defined associations are created by HubSpot integrations.

items.description: Request schema for defining association types between CRM objects.

types.title: Types
types.description: A list of association type definitions, specifying the category and type ID for each association.

items.description: Request schema for defining associations between the new contact and existing CRM objects.

associations.title: Associations
associations.description: List of associations to create with other existing HubSpot objects (e.g., companies, deals).

annualrevenue.title: Annualrevenue
annualrevenue.description: The annual revenue of the company the contact works for.

lifecyclestage.title: Lifecyclestage
lifecyclestage.description: The contact's current stage in your sales and marketing funnel.

custom_properties.title: Custom Properties
custom_properties.description: A dictionary of custom properties to set for the contact. Keys are the internal names of your custom contact properties, and values are the data to set.

items.description: Request schema for creating individual contacts within a batch operation.

inputs.title: Inputs
inputs.description: A list of contact objects to create. Each object represents one new contact with its properties and optional associations.

inputSchema.description: Request schema for creating a batch of new contacts in HubSpot.

tools.name: HUBSPOT_CREATE_BATCH_OF_DEALS
tools.description: DEPRECATED: Please use 'CREATE_DEALS' instead.

items.title: InputsRequest

properties.title: Properties

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: Total monetary value of the deal.

hs_acv.title: Hs Acv
hs_acv.description: Annual Contract Value (ACV) of the deal.

hs_arr.title: Hs Arr
hs_arr.description: Annual Recurring Revenue (ARR) of the deal.

hs_mrr.title: Hs Mrr
hs_mrr.description: Monthly Recurring Revenue (MRR) of the deal.

hs_tcv.title: Hs Tcv
hs_tcv.description: Total Contract Value (TCV), including one-time and recurring charges.

dealname.title: Dealname
dealname.description: Name or title of the deal. Typically required for creating a new deal.

pipeline.title: Pipeline
pipeline.description: ID or internal name of the sales pipeline this deal belongs to.

closedate.title: Closedate
closedate.description: Expected or actual close date (e.g., YYYY-MM-DD or Unix timestamp in milliseconds).

dealstage.title: Dealstage
dealstage.description: ID or internal name of the current deal stage within a HubSpot pipeline.

createdate.title: Createdate
createdate.description: Read-only: Date and time the deal was created.

description.title: Description
description.description: Brief summary or notes about the deal.

hs_campaign.title: Hs Campaign
hs_campaign.description: HubSpot campaign ID that led to this deal.

hs_is_closed.title: Hs Is Closed
hs_is_closed.description: Read-only: Indicates if the deal is closed ('true' or 'false'), derived from `dealstage`.

hs_next_step.title: Hs Next Step
hs_next_step.description: Next actionable step for this deal.

hs_object_id.title: Hs Object Id
hs_object_id.description: Read-only: Unique ID of the deal in HubSpot.

days_to_close.title: Days To Close
days_to_close.description: Read-only: Number of days between creation and close date, calculated by HubSpot.

hs_createdate.title: Hs Createdate
hs_createdate.description: Read-only: Exact date and time the deal was created in HubSpot.

hs_all_team_ids.title: Hs All Team Ids
hs_all_team_ids.description: Read-only: Semicolon-separated list of all teams assigned as an owner.

hs_all_owner_ids.title: Hs All Owner Ids
hs_all_owner_ids.description: Read-only: Semicolon-separated list of all assigned owner IDs.

hs_closed_amount.title: Hs Closed Amount
hs_closed_amount.description: Final amount of the deal when closed.

hubspot_owner_id.title: Hubspot Owner Id
hubspot_owner_id.description: ID of the HubSpot user assigned as the deal owner.

closed_won_reason.title: Closed Won Reason
closed_won_reason.description: Reason why the deal was won.

custom_properties.title: Custom Properties
custom_properties.description: Dictionary of custom properties. Keys are internal names, values are the values to set.

closed_lost_reason.title: Closed Lost Reason
closed_lost_reason.description: Reason why the deal was lost.

deal_currency_code.title: Deal Currency Code
deal_currency_code.description: ISO 4217 currency code for the deal's amount.

hs_forecast_amount.title: Hs Forecast Amount
hs_forecast_amount.description: Weighted amount of the deal ('Amount' * 'Deal Stage Probability') for sales forecasting.

hs_analytics_source.title: Hs Analytics Source
hs_analytics_source.description: Read-only: Original source of the associated contact (e.g., 'Organic Search').

hs_lastmodifieddate.title: Hs Lastmodifieddate
hs_lastmodifieddate.description: Read-only: Date and time the deal was last modified.

hs_projected_amount.title: Hs Projected Amount
hs_projected_amount.description: Deprecated. Use `hs_forecast_amount` instead. Projected deal amount.

amount_in_home_currency.title: Amount In Home Currency
amount_in_home_currency.description: Read-only: Deal amount in the company's home currency, calculated by HubSpot.

hs_forecast_probability.title: Hs Forecast Probability
hs_forecast_probability.description: Probability of closing the deal for forecasting; can be manual or stage-based.

hs_deal_stage_probability.title: Hs Deal Stage Probability
hs_deal_stage_probability.description: Read-only: Win probability for the current deal stage, based on pipeline settings.

hs_all_accessible_team_ids.title: Hs All Accessible Team Ids
hs_all_accessible_team_ids.description: Read-only: Semicolon-separated list of team IDs with access to this deal.

engagements_last_meeting_booked.title: Engagements Last Meeting Booked
engagements_last_meeting_booked.description: Read-only: Date of the most recent meeting booked associated with this deal.

hs_all_assigned_business_unit_ids.title: Hs All Assigned Business Unit Ids
hs_all_assigned_business_unit_ids.description: Read-only: Semicolon-separated list of assigned business unit IDs (requires Business Units add-on).

hs_closed_amount_in_home_currency.title: Hs Closed Amount In Home Currency
hs_closed_amount_in_home_currency.description: Read-only: Final closed amount in company's home currency, calculated by HubSpot.

hs_projected_amount_in_home_currency.title: Hs Projected Amount In Home Currency
hs_projected_amount_in_home_currency.description: Deprecated. Projected deal amount in home currency.

engagements_last_meeting_booked_medium.title: Engagements Last Meeting Booked Medium
engagements_last_meeting_booked_medium.description: Read-only: Medium (e.g., 'EMAIL', 'CALL') of the last meeting booked.

engagements_last_meeting_booked_source.title: Engagements Last Meeting Booked Source
engagements_last_meeting_booked_source.description: Read-only: Source (e.g., 'CRM_UI', 'SALES_TOOLS') of the last meeting booked.

engagements_last_meeting_booked_campaign.title: Engagements Last Meeting Booked Campaign
engagements_last_meeting_booked_campaign.description: Read-only: HubSpot campaign ID for the last meeting booked.

tools.name: HUBSPOT_CREATE_BATCH_OF_FEEDBACK_SUBMISSIONS

associationCategory.title: Association Category
associationCategory.description: Category of the association: `HUBSPOT_DEFINED` (standard), `USER_DEFINED` (custom), or `INTEGRATOR_DEFINED` (integration-created). HubSpot-defined are generally recommended.

types.title: Types

to__id.title: To  Id

associations.title: Associations
associations.description: A list of associations to be created for this feedback submission with other CRM objects.

inputs.title: Inputs

tools.name: HUBSPOT_CREATE_BATCH_OF_OBJECTS

items.title: InputsRequest

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: A dictionary of properties for the object; keys are internal property names, and values are their corresponding string values. Property names must be valid for the specified `objectType`.

items.title: AssociationsRequest
TypesRequest

associationTypeId.description: The unique identifier for the type of association (e.g., contact to company, deal to contact).

associationCategory.title: Association Category

types.title: Types

to__id.title: To  Id
to__id.description: The unique identifier of the existing object to associate with the new object.

associations.title: Associations

name.title: Name

hidden.title: Hidden
hidden.description: If true, property is hidden and inaccessible in HubSpot UI.

hidden.title: Hidden
hidden.description: If true, hides the option in the HubSpot UI.

description.title: Description

displayOrder.title: Display Order

fieldType.title: Field Type
fieldType.description: Controls UI rendering, behavior, and input field type for the property.

formField.title: Form Field
formField.description: If true, property can be used in HubSpot forms.

groupName.title: Group Name
groupName.description: Property group name for UI organization.

description.title: Description
description.description: User-friendly description/help text displayed in HubSpot UI.

displayOrder.title: Display Order
displayOrder.description: Display order within its group in UI (ascending; -1 for last).

hasUniqueValue.title: Has Unique Value
hasUniqueValue.description: If true, property value must be unique across all object records; unchangeable once set.

externalOptions.title: External Options
externalOptions.description: For 'enumeration' type properties, if true, options are sourced externally (e.g., from HubSpot users if `referencedObjectType` is 'OWNER').

calculationFormula.title: Calculation Formula
calculationFormula.description: HubSpot-specific formula if `fieldType` is 'calculation_equation', to compute the property's value.

referencedObjectType.title: Referenced Object Type
referencedObjectType.description: For "enumeration" type with `externalOptions` true, set to "OWNER" to source options from HubSpot users.

tools.name: HUBSPOT_CREATE_BATCH_OF_TICKET
tools.description: DEPRECATED: Please use 'CREATE_TICKETS' instead.

inputSchema.title: CreateBatchOfTicketRequest

items.title: InputsRequest

properties.title: Properties

content.title: Content
examples: User is reporting an issue with the login page.
content.description: Main content or description of the ticket, detailing the issue or request.

subject.title: Subject
subject.description: Subject line or title of the ticket (often a required field for ticket creation).

created_by.title: Created By
created_by.description: ID of the user who initially created the ticket.

createdate.title: Createdate
createdate.description: Date and time ticket was created (ISO 8601 format); HubSpot automatically sets this if not provided.

hs_tag_ids.title: Hs Tag Ids
hs_tag_ids.description: Tag IDs applied to the ticket for categorization or filtering.

closed_date.title: Closed Date
closed_date.description: Date and time ticket was closed (ISO 8601 format, e.g., 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.SSSZ').

hs_pipeline.title: Hs Pipeline
hs_pipeline.description: ID of the pipeline this ticket belongs to (uses default pipeline if not provided).

source_type.title: Source Type
source_type.description: Source from which the ticket originated.

time_to_close.title: Time To Close
time_to_close.description: Duration taken to resolve and close the ticket (usually set by HubSpot upon closing).

hs_all_team_ids.title: Hs All Team Ids
hs_all_team_ids.description: All team IDs associated with this ticket, including primary and secondary.

hubspot_team_id.title: Hubspot Team Id
hubspot_team_id.description: HubSpot team ID assigned to this ticket.

last_reply_date.title: Last Reply Date
last_reply_date.description: Date and time of the last reply sent or received regarding the ticket (ISO 8601 format).

hs_all_owner_ids.title: Hs All Owner Ids
hs_all_owner_ids.description: All HubSpot user IDs who are owners of this ticket, including primary and secondary.

hs_lastcontacted.title: Hs Lastcontacted
hs_lastcontacted.description: Date and time of the last contact activity related to the ticket (ISO 8601 format).

hubspot_owner_id.title: Hubspot Owner Id
hubspot_owner_id.description: HubSpot user ID of the owner assigned to this ticket.

custom_properties.title: Custom Properties
custom_properties.description: Custom properties for the ticket, using internal names as keys and providing their values (e.g., `{'my_custom_field': 'value'}`).

hs_pipeline_stage.title: Hs Pipeline Stage
hs_pipeline_stage.description: ID of the stage within the pipeline this ticket is currently in (required if `hs_pipeline` is set).

hs_primary_company.title: Hs Primary Company
hs_primary_company.description: ID of the primary company associated with this ticket.

hs_ticket_category.title: Hs Ticket Category
hs_ticket_category.description: Category of the ticket (values are often custom to your HubSpot setup).

notes_last_updated.title: Notes Last Updated
notes_last_updated.description: Date and time when notes associated with the ticket were last updated (ISO 8601 format).

hs_lastmodifieddate.title: Hs Lastmodifieddate
hs_lastmodifieddate.description: Date and time when the ticket was last modified (ISO 8601 format; HubSpot automatically updates this).

hs_assigned_team_ids.title: Hs Assigned Team Ids
hs_assigned_team_ids.description: Team IDs specifically assigned to work on this ticket.

hs_assignment_method.title: Hs Assignment Method
hs_assignment_method.description: Method used for assigning the ticket.

last_engagement_date.title: Last Engagement Date
last_engagement_date.description: Date and time of the last engagement activity on the ticket (ISO 8601 format).

notes_last_contacted.title: Notes Last Contacted
notes_last_contacted.description: Date and time of the last contact as recorded in notes (ISO 8601 format).

hs_created_by_user_id.title: Hs Created By User Id
hs_created_by_user_id.description: HubSpot user ID of the person who created the ticket within the HubSpot system.

first_agent_reply_date.title: First Agent Reply Date
first_agent_reply_date.description: Date and time of the first agent reply to this ticket (ISO 8601 format).

notes_next_activity_date.title: Notes Next Activity Date
notes_next_activity_date.description: Date and time for the next scheduled activity related to the ticket notes (ISO 8601 format).

hs_all_accessible_team_ids.title: Hs All Accessible Team Ids
hs_all_accessible_team_ids.description: All team IDs with access to view or interact with this ticket (typically HubSpot-managed).

hs_all_conversation_mentions.title: Hs All Conversation Mentions
hs_all_conversation_mentions.description: Read-only. User IDs or names mentioned in the ticket's conversation thread (HubSpot-populated).

hs_all_associated_contact_emails.title: Hs All Associated Contact Emails
hs_all_associated_contact_emails.description: Read-only. Email addresses of contacts associated with this ticket (HubSpot-populated).

hs_all_associated_contact_phones.title: Hs All Associated Contact Phones
hs_all_associated_contact_phones.description: Read-only. Phone numbers of contacts associated with this ticket (HubSpot-populated).

hs_auto_generated_from_thread_id.title: Hs Auto Generated From Thread Id
hs_auto_generated_from_thread_id.description: ID of the conversation thread if this ticket was automatically generated from it.

hs_all_assigned_business_unit_ids.title: Hs All Assigned Business Unit Ids
hs_all_assigned_business_unit_ids.description: All business unit IDs associated with this ticket for data partitioning (typically HubSpot-managed).

hs_all_associated_contact_companies.title: Hs All Associated Contact Companies
hs_all_associated_contact_companies.description: Read-only. Company names linked to contacts associated with this ticket (HubSpot-populated).

hs_all_associated_contact_lastnames.title: Hs All Associated Contact Lastnames
hs_all_associated_contact_lastnames.description: Read-only. Last names of contacts associated with this ticket (HubSpot-populated).

hs_all_associated_contact_firstnames.title: Hs All Associated Contact Firstnames
hs_all_associated_contact_firstnames.description: Read-only. First names of contacts associated with this ticket (HubSpot-populated).

hs_all_associated_contact_mobilephones.title: Hs All Associated Contact Mobilephones
hs_all_associated_contact_mobilephones.description: Read-only. Mobile phone numbers of contacts associated with this ticket (HubSpot-populated).

hs_conversations_originating_thread_id.title: Hs Conversations Originating Thread Id
hs_conversations_originating_thread_id.description: ID of the conversation thread from which this ticket originated.

hs_conversations_originating_message_id.title: Hs Conversations Originating Message Id
hs_conversations_originating_message_id.description: ID of the initial message in the conversation that led to this ticket's creation.

properties.description: Properties for the new ticket (e.g., `subject`, `hs_pipeline`, `hs_pipeline_stage`); `subject` is often required.

associationCategory.title: Association Category

tools.name: HUBSPOT_CREATE_CONTACT
tools.description: Creates a new HubSpot contact.

inputSchema.title: CreateContactObjectWithPropertiesRequest

zip.title: Zip
zip.description: The contact's postal code or ZIP code.

city.title: City
city.description: The city where the contact resides.

email.title: Email
email.description: The primary email address of the contact. This is a unique identifier for contacts in HubSpot.

phone.title: Phone
phone.description: The contact's primary phone number (often a business phone).

photo.title: Photo
photo.description: URL of the contact's photo or avatar.

state.title: State
state.description: The state or region where the contact resides.

degree.title: Degree
degree.description: The contact's highest completed educational degree.

school.title: School
school.description: The name of the school, college, or university the contact attended.

address.title: Address
address.description: The contact's street address, including apartment or unit number.

company.title: Company
company.description: The name of the company the contact works for. If `associatedcompanyid` is set, this field might be auto-populated.

country.title: Country
country.description: The country where the contact resides.

ip_city.title: Ip City
ip_city.description: The city associated with the contact's IP address, often captured during their first website visit or form submission.

message.title: Message
examples: Interested in learning more about your enterprise solutions.
message.description: A free-text message or note often captured from a form submission's message field.

website.title: Website
website.description: The URL of the contact's personal or company website.

industry.title: Industry
industry.description: The primary industry of the company the contact works for.

ip_state.title: Ip State
ip_state.description: The state or region associated with the contact's IP address.

closedate.title: Closedate
closedate.description: The date when the deal associated with this contact was closed. Expected format is a UTC timestamp in milliseconds.

ip_latlon.title: Ip Latlon
ip_latlon.description: The approximate latitude and longitude associated with the contact's IP address, typically in 'latitude,longitude' format.

num_notes.title: Num Notes
num_notes.description: The total number of notes logged on the contact's record.

ownername.title: Ownername
ownername.description: The full name of the HubSpot user who owns this contact. Read-only.

seniority.title: Seniority
seniority.description: The contact's seniority level within their organization.

createdate.title: Createdate
createdate.description: The date and time when the contact record was created in HubSpot. This is a read-only property, typically a UTC timestamp.

ip_country.title: Ip Country
ip_country.description: The country associated with the contact's IP address.

ip_zipcode.title: Ip Zipcode
ip_zipcode.description: The postal code or ZIP code associated with the contact's IP address.

owneremail.title: Owneremail
owneremail.description: The email address of the HubSpot user who owns this contact. Read-only, reflects the owner's primary email.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The contact's start date, typically referring to their employment start date at their current company. Format can vary.

twitterbio.title: Twitterbio
twitterbio.description: The contact's biography from their Twitter profile.

work_email.title: Work Email
work_email.description: The contact's work email address. This might be different from the primary `email` if that's a personal address.

linkedinbio.title: Linkedinbio
examples: Experienced marketing professional with a passion for digital strategy.
linkedinbio.description: The contact's biography from their LinkedIn profile.

items.title: AssociationsRequest

to.title: To
to.description: The object to associate with. Must be a dictionary with an 'id' key containing the target object's ID (e.g., {'id': '1234567890'}).

items.title: TypesRequest

associationTypeId.title: Association Type Id
associationTypeId.description: The ID of the association type. This is a unique identifier for the type of relationship (e.g., Contact to Company).

associationCategory.title: Association Category
associationCategory.description: A category of the association. Possible values: `HUBSPOT_DEFINED` - an association type created by HubSpot, `USER_DEFINED` - an association type created by the user, `INTEGRATOR_DEFINED` - an association type created by an integration.

items.description: Request schema for `Types`

types.title: Types
types.description: A list of association types and their categories to be created between the new contact and another object. Each item in the list defines one association.

items.description: Request schema for `Associations`

associations.title: Associations
associations.description: List of associations to create with other existing HubSpot objects (e.g., companies, deals).

company_size.title: Company Size
company_size.description: The size of the company the contact works for, often categorized (e.g., '1-10 employees', '501-1000 employees').

hubspotscore.title: Hubspotscore
hubspotscore.description: The contact's HubSpot lead score, calculated based on criteria defined in your HubSpot portal's scoring settings.

job_function.title: Job Function
job_function.description: The contact's job function or department.

numemployees.title: Numemployees
numemployees.description: The number of employees at the company the contact works for. Must be one of HubSpot's predefined ranges: '1', '2-5', '6-25', '26-50', '51-200', '201-500', '501-1000', '1001-5000', '5001-10000', '10000+'.

annualrevenue.title: Annualrevenue
annualrevenue.description: The annual revenue of the company the contact works for.

date_of_birth.title: Date Of Birth
date_of_birth.description: The contact's date of birth. Format can vary, but YYYY-MM-DD is common.

days_to_close.title: Days To Close
days_to_close.description: The number of days it took to close the deal associated with this contact. This is usually calculated automatically.

followercount.title: Followercount
followercount.description: The number of followers the contact has on a specified social media platform (e.g., Twitter).

ip_state_code.title: Ip State Code
ip_state_code.description: The state or region code associated with the contact's IP address (e.g., US state code).

total_revenue.title: Total Revenue
total_revenue.description: The total revenue generated from all closed-won deals associated with this contact.

twitterhandle.title: Twitterhandle
twitterhandle.description: The contact's Twitter username (handle), without the '@' symbol.

field_of_study.title: Field Of Study
field_of_study.description: The contact's primary field of study during their education.

lifecyclestage.title: Lifecyclestage
lifecyclestage.description: The contact's current stage in your sales and marketing funnel (e.g., 'Lead', 'Marketing Qualified Lead', 'Customer'). These stages are customizable in HubSpot.

graduation_date.title: Graduation Date
graduation_date.description: The contact's graduation date from their educational institution. Format can vary.

hs_all_team_ids.title: Hs All Team Ids
hs_all_team_ids.description: A semicolon-separated list of all HubSpot Team IDs this contact is or has been associated with.

hubspot_team_id.title: Hubspot Team Id
hubspot_team_id.description: The ID of the HubSpot team that owns this contact.

ip_country_code.title: Ip Country Code
ip_country_code.description: The two-letter country code (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2) associated with the contact's IP address.

hs_all_owner_ids.title: Hs All Owner Ids
hs_all_owner_ids.description: A semicolon-separated list of all HubSpot Owner IDs who have been assigned to this contact at some point.

hubspot_owner_id.title: Hubspot Owner Id
hubspot_owner_id.description: The ID of the HubSpot user who is the current owner of this contact.

lastmodifieddate.title: Lastmodifieddate
lastmodifieddate.description: The date and time when the contact record was last modified. This is a read-only property, UTC timestamp.

custom_properties.title: Custom Properties
custom_properties.description: A dictionary of custom properties to set for the contact. Keys are the internal names of your custom contact properties, and values are the data to set. Example: `{'custom_property_internal_name': 'value_for_custom_property'}`.

kloutscoregeneral.title: Kloutscoregeneral
kloutscoregeneral.description: The contact's general Klout score, if available and integrated. Klout was a service that rated social media influence.

notes_last_updated.title: Notes Last Updated
notes_last_updated.description: The date and time when the notes on the contact record were last updated. UTC timestamp in milliseconds.

recent_deal_amount.title: Recent Deal Amount
recent_deal_amount.description: The amount of the most recent closed-won deal associated with this contact.

associatedcompanyid.title: Associatedcompanyid
associatedcompanyid.description: The ID of the primary company associated with this contact. This is a read-only property automatically updated when an association is made.

currentlyinworkflow.title: Currentlyinworkflow
currentlyinworkflow.description: Indicates whether the contact is currently active in any HubSpot workflow. Boolean value, 'true' or 'false'.

hs_all_contact_vids.title: Hs All Contact Vids
hs_all_contact_vids.description: A semicolon-separated list of all HubSpot Contact VID (Visitor ID) values associated with this contact, typically used for merging contacts.

hs_analytics_source.title: Hs Analytics Source
hs_analytics_source.description: The original source that generated the contact. Must be one of HubSpot's predefined source values (e.g., 'ORGANIC_SEARCH', 'PAID_SEARCH', 'PAID_SOCIAL', 'DIRECT_TRAFFIC', 'REFERRALS', 'OFFLINE', 'EMAIL_MARKETING', 'OTHER_CAMPAIGNS').

linkedinconnections.title: Linkedinconnections
linkedinconnections.description: The number of LinkedIn connections the contact has.

num_contacted_notes.title: Num Contacted Notes
num_contacted_notes.description: The number of notes on the contact record that relate to being contacted (e.g., call logs, meeting notes).

twitterprofilephoto.title: Twitterprofilephoto
twitterprofilephoto.description: URL of the contact's Twitter profile photo.

hs_additional_emails.title: Hs Additional Emails
hs_additional_emails.description: A semicolon-separated list of additional email addresses for the contact.

hs_analytics_revenue.title: Hs Analytics Revenue
hs_analytics_revenue.description: Revenue attributed to this contact through HubSpot's analytics or e-commerce integrations. This is often a sum of closed-won deal amounts associated with the contact.

notes_last_contacted.title: Notes Last Contacted
notes_last_contacted.description: The date and time the contact was last contacted, based on logged activities like calls, emails, or meetings. UTC timestamp in milliseconds. This is a read-only property; attempting to set it will be ignored.

num_associated_deals.title: Num Associated Deals
num_associated_deals.description: The total number of deals currently associated with this contact.

first_conversion_date.title: First Conversion Date
first_conversion_date.description: The date and time of the contact's first conversion (e.g., form submission). UTC timestamp.

hs_analytics_last_url.title: Hs Analytics Last Url
hs_analytics_last_url.description: The last URL on your website that the contact visited.

num_conversion_events.title: Num Conversion Events
num_conversion_events.description: The total number of conversion events (e.g., form submissions, CTA clicks) attributed to this contact.

hs_analytics_first_url.title: Hs Analytics First Url
hs_analytics_first_url.description: The first URL on your website that the contact visited.

recent_conversion_date.title: Recent Conversion Date
recent_conversion_date.description: The date and time of the contact's most recent conversion event. UTC timestamp.

recent_deal_close_date.title: Recent Deal Close Date
recent_deal_close_date.description: The close date of the most recent closed-won deal associated with this contact. UTC timestamp in milliseconds.

first_deal_created_date.title: First Deal Created Date
first_deal_created_date.description: The date and time when the first deal was created for this contact. UTC timestamp.

hs_analytics_num_visits.title: Hs Analytics Num Visits
hs_analytics_num_visits.description: The total number of sessions (visits) the contact has had on your website.

webinareventlastupdated.title: Webinareventlastupdated
webinareventlastupdated.description: Timestamp of the last update related to a webinar event (e.g., GoToWebinar) for this contact, if integrated. UTC timestamp.

notes_next_activity_date.title: Notes Next Activity Date
notes_next_activity_date.description: The date and time of the next scheduled activity (e.g., task, meeting) with the contact. UTC timestamp in milliseconds.

hs_all_accessible_team_ids.title: Hs All Accessible Team Ids
hs_all_accessible_team_ids.description: A semicolon-separated list of HubSpot Team IDs that have access to this contact record.

hs_analytics_last_referrer.title: Hs Analytics Last Referrer
hs_analytics_last_referrer.description: The last referring URL that brought the contact to your website before their most recent session.

hs_analytics_source_data_1.title: Hs Analytics Source Data 1
hs_analytics_source_data_1.description: Additional detail for the source. For 'Organic search', this might be the search engine. For 'Paid social', this could be the social media platform.

hs_analytics_source_data_2.title: Hs Analytics Source Data 2
hs_analytics_source_data_2.description: Further detail for the source. For 'Organic search', this might be the keyword. For 'Paid social', this could be the campaign name.

hubspot_owner_assigneddate.title: Hubspot Owner Assigneddate
hubspot_owner_assigneddate.description: The date and time when a HubSpot owner was most recently assigned to this contact. UTC timestamp in milliseconds.

first_conversion_event_name.title: First Conversion Event Name
first_conversion_event_name.description: The name or identifier of the event that marked the contact's first conversion.

hs_analytics_first_referrer.title: Hs Analytics First Referrer
hs_analytics_first_referrer.description: The first referring URL that brought the contact to your website.

hs_analytics_last_timestamp.title: Hs Analytics Last Timestamp
hs_analytics_last_timestamp.description: Timestamp of the contact's last recorded interaction (e.g., last website visit, form submission). UTC timestamp.

hs_analytics_num_page_views.title: Hs Analytics Num Page Views
hs_analytics_num_page_views.description: The total number of pages viewed by the contact on your website.

associatedcompanylastupdated.title: Associatedcompanylastupdated
associatedcompanylastupdated.description: The timestamp of the last update to the primary associated company. This is a read-only property.

hs_analytics_first_timestamp.title: Hs Analytics First Timestamp
hs_analytics_first_timestamp.description: Timestamp of the contact's first recorded interaction (e.g., first website visit). UTC timestamp.

num_unique_conversion_events.title: Num Unique Conversion Events
num_unique_conversion_events.description: The number of unique types of conversion events completed by the contact.

recent_conversion_event_name.title: Recent Conversion Event Name
recent_conversion_event_name.description: The name or identifier of the contact's most recent conversion event.

surveymonkeyeventlastupdated.title: Surveymonkeyeventlastupdated
surveymonkeyeventlastupdated.description: Timestamp of the last update related to a SurveyMonkey event for this contact, if integrated. UTC timestamp.

engagements_last_meeting_booked.title: Engagements Last Meeting Booked
engagements_last_meeting_booked.description: Timestamp of the last meeting booked with the contact through HubSpot's meetings tool.

hs_analytics_average_page_views.title: Hs Analytics Average Page Views
hs_analytics_average_page_views.description: The average number of pages viewed by the contact per session on your website, tracked by HubSpot analytics.

hs_all_assigned_business_unit_ids.title: Hs All Assigned Business Unit Ids
hs_all_assigned_business_unit_ids.description: A semicolon-separated list of Business Unit IDs assigned to this contact, if using HubSpot's Business Units feature.

hs_analytics_last_visit_timestamp.title: Hs Analytics Last Visit Timestamp
hs_analytics_last_visit_timestamp.description: Timestamp of the contact's most recent visit to your website. UTC timestamp.

hs_analytics_first_visit_timestamp.title: Hs Analytics First Visit Timestamp
hs_analytics_first_visit_timestamp.description: Timestamp of the contact's first visit to your website. UTC timestamp.

hs_analytics_num_event_completions.title: Hs Analytics Num Event Completions
hs_analytics_num_event_completions.description: The total number of HubSpot custom events completed by the contact.

engagements_last_meeting_booked_medium.title: Engagements Last Meeting Booked Medium
engagements_last_meeting_booked_medium.description: The medium (e.g., 'Meetings Tool', 'Email') through which the last meeting was booked.

engagements_last_meeting_booked_source.title: Engagements Last Meeting Booked Source
engagements_last_meeting_booked_source.description: The source (e.g., 'SALES', 'MARKETING') of the last meeting booked.

engagements_last_meeting_booked_campaign.title: Engagements Last Meeting Booked Campaign
engagements_last_meeting_booked_campaign.description: The HubSpot campaign ID (GUID) associated with the last meeting booked.

hs_analytics_last_touch_converting_campa.title: Hs Analytics Last Touch Converting Campaign
hs_analytics_last_touch_converting_campa.description: The HubSpot campaign ID (GUID) of the campaign that led to the contact's most recent conversion.

hs_analytics_first_touch_converting_camp.title: Hs Analytics First Touch Converting Campaign
hs_analytics_first_touch_converting_camp.description: The HubSpot campaign ID (GUID) of the campaign that led to the contact's first conversion.

inputSchema.description: Request schema for `CreateContactObjectWithProperties`

tools.name: HUBSPOT_CREATE_CONTACT_OBJECT_WITH_PROPERTIES
tools.description: DEPRECATED: Please use 'CREATE_CONTACT' instead.

inputSchema.title: CreateContactObjectWithPropertiesRequest

zip.title: Zip
zip.description: The contact's postal code or ZIP code.

city.title: City
city.description: The city where the contact resides.

email.title: Email
email.description: The primary email address of the contact. This is a unique identifier for contacts in HubSpot.

phone.title: Phone
phone.description: The contact's primary phone number (often a business phone).

photo.title: Photo
photo.description: URL of the contact's photo or avatar.

state.title: State
state.description: The state or region where the contact resides.

degree.title: Degree
degree.description: The contact's highest completed educational degree.

school.title: School
school.description: The name of the school, college, or university the contact attended.

address.title: Address
address.description: The contact's street address, including apartment or unit number.

company.title: Company
company.description: The name of the company the contact works for. If `associatedcompanyid` is set, this field might be auto-populated.

country.title: Country
country.description: The country where the contact resides.

ip_city.title: Ip City
ip_city.description: The city associated with the contact's IP address, often captured during their first website visit or form submission.

message.title: Message
examples: Interested in learning more about your enterprise solutions.
message.description: A free-text message or note often captured from a form submission's message field.

website.title: Website
website.description: The URL of the contact's personal or company website.

industry.title: Industry
industry.description: The primary industry of the company the contact works for.

ip_state.title: Ip State
ip_state.description: The state or region associated with the contact's IP address.

closedate.title: Closedate
closedate.description: The date when the deal associated with this contact was closed. Expected format is a UTC timestamp in milliseconds.

ip_latlon.title: Ip Latlon
ip_latlon.description: The approximate latitude and longitude associated with the contact's IP address, typically in 'latitude,longitude' format.

num_notes.title: Num Notes
num_notes.description: The total number of notes logged on the contact's record.

ownername.title: Ownername
ownername.description: The full name of the HubSpot user who owns this contact. Read-only.

seniority.title: Seniority
seniority.description: The contact's seniority level within their organization.

createdate.title: Createdate
createdate.description: The date and time when the contact record was created in HubSpot. This is a read-only property, typically a UTC timestamp.

ip_country.title: Ip Country
ip_country.description: The country associated with the contact's IP address.

ip_zipcode.title: Ip Zipcode
ip_zipcode.description: The postal code or ZIP code associated with the contact's IP address.

owneremail.title: Owneremail
owneremail.description: The email address of the HubSpot user who owns this contact. Read-only, reflects the owner's primary email.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The contact's start date, typically referring to their employment start date at their current company. Format can vary.

twitterbio.title: Twitterbio
twitterbio.description: The contact's biography from their Twitter profile.

work_email.title: Work Email
work_email.description: The contact's work email address. This might be different from the primary `email` if that's a personal address.

linkedinbio.title: Linkedinbio
examples: Experienced marketing professional with a passion for digital strategy.
linkedinbio.description: The contact's biography from their LinkedIn profile.

items.title: AssociationsRequest

to.title: To
to.description: The object to associate with. Must be a dictionary with an 'id' key containing the target object's ID (e.g., {'id': '1234567890'}).

items.title: TypesRequest

associationTypeId.title: Association Type Id
associationTypeId.description: The ID of the association type. This is a unique identifier for the type of relationship (e.g., Contact to Company).

associationCategory.title: Association Category
associationCategory.description: A category of the association. Possible values: `HUBSPOT_DEFINED` - an association type created by HubSpot, `USER_DEFINED` - an association type created by the user, `INTEGRATOR_DEFINED` - an association type created by an integration.

items.description: Request schema for `Types`

types.title: Types
types.description: A list of association types and their categories to be created between the new contact and another object. Each item in the list defines one association.

items.description: Request schema for `Associations`

associations.title: Associations
associations.description: List of associations to create with other existing HubSpot objects (e.g., companies, deals).

company_size.title: Company Size
company_size.description: The size of the company the contact works for, often categorized (e.g., '1-10 employees', '501-1000 employees').

hubspotscore.title: Hubspotscore
hubspotscore.description: The contact's HubSpot lead score, calculated based on criteria defined in your HubSpot portal's scoring settings.

job_function.title: Job Function
job_function.description: The contact's job function or department.

numemployees.title: Numemployees
numemployees.description: The number of employees at the company the contact works for. Must be one of HubSpot's predefined ranges: '1', '2-5', '6-25', '26-50', '51-200', '201-500', '501-1000', '1001-5000', '5001-10000', '10000+'.

annualrevenue.title: Annualrevenue
annualrevenue.description: The annual revenue of the company the contact works for.

date_of_birth.title: Date Of Birth
date_of_birth.description: The contact's date of birth. Format can vary, but YYYY-MM-DD is common.

days_to_close.title: Days To Close
days_to_close.description: The number of days it took to close the deal associated with this contact. This is usually calculated automatically.

followercount.title: Followercount
followercount.description: The number of followers the contact has on a specified social media platform (e.g., Twitter).

ip_state_code.title: Ip State Code
ip_state_code.description: The state or region code associated with the contact's IP address (e.g., US state code).

total_revenue.title: Total Revenue
total_revenue.description: The total revenue generated from all closed-won deals associated with this contact.

twitterhandle.title: Twitterhandle
twitterhandle.description: The contact's Twitter username (handle), without the '@' symbol.

field_of_study.title: Field Of Study
field_of_study.description: The contact's primary field of study during their education.

lifecyclestage.title: Lifecyclestage
lifecyclestage.description: The contact's current stage in your sales and marketing funnel (e.g., 'Lead', 'Marketing Qualified Lead', 'Customer'). These stages are customizable in HubSpot.

graduation_date.title: Graduation Date
graduation_date.description: The contact's graduation date from their educational institution. Format can vary.

hs_all_team_ids.title: Hs All Team Ids
hs_all_team_ids.description: A semicolon-separated list of all HubSpot Team IDs this contact is or has been associated with.

hubspot_team_id.title: Hubspot Team Id
hubspot_team_id.description: The ID of the HubSpot team that owns this contact.

ip_country_code.title: Ip Country Code
ip_country_code.description: The two-letter country code (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2) associated with the contact's IP address.

hs_all_owner_ids.title: Hs All Owner Ids
hs_all_owner_ids.description: A semicolon-separated list of all HubSpot Owner IDs who have been assigned to this contact at some point.

hubspot_owner_id.title: Hubspot Owner Id
hubspot_owner_id.description: The ID of the HubSpot user who is the current owner of this contact.

lastmodifieddate.title: Lastmodifieddate
lastmodifieddate.description: The date and time when the contact record was last modified. This is a read-only property, UTC timestamp.

custom_properties.title: Custom Properties
custom_properties.description: A dictionary of custom properties to set for the contact. Keys are the internal names of your custom contact properties, and values are the data to set. Example: `{'custom_property_internal_name': 'value_for_custom_property'}`.

kloutscoregeneral.title: Kloutscoregeneral
kloutscoregeneral.description: The contact's general Klout score, if available and integrated. Klout was a service that rated social media influence.

notes_last_updated.title: Notes Last Updated
notes_last_updated.description: The date and time when the notes on the contact record were last updated. UTC timestamp in milliseconds.

recent_deal_amount.title: Recent Deal Amount
recent_deal_amount.description: The amount of the most recent closed-won deal associated with this contact.

associatedcompanyid.title: Associatedcompanyid
associatedcompanyid.description: The ID of the primary company associated with this contact. This is a read-only property automatically updated when an association is made.

currentlyinworkflow.title: Currentlyinworkflow
currentlyinworkflow.description: Indicates whether the contact is currently active in any HubSpot workflow. Boolean value, 'true' or 'false'.

hs_all_contact_vids.title: Hs All Contact Vids
hs_all_contact_vids.description: A semicolon-separated list of all HubSpot Contact VID (Visitor ID) values associated with this contact, typically used for merging contacts.

hs_analytics_source.title: Hs Analytics Source
hs_analytics_source.description: The original source that generated the contact. Must be one of HubSpot's predefined source values (e.g., 'ORGANIC_SEARCH', 'PAID_SEARCH', 'PAID_SOCIAL', 'DIRECT_TRAFFIC', 'REFERRALS', 'OFFLINE', 'EMAIL_MARKETING', 'OTHER_CAMPAIGNS').

linkedinconnections.title: Linkedinconnections
linkedinconnections.description: The number of LinkedIn connections the contact has.

num_contacted_notes.title: Num Contacted Notes
num_contacted_notes.description: The number of notes on the contact record that relate to being contacted (e.g., call logs, meeting notes).

twitterprofilephoto.title: Twitterprofilephoto
twitterprofilephoto.description: URL of the contact's Twitter profile photo.

hs_additional_emails.title: Hs Additional Emails
hs_additional_emails.description: A semicolon-separated list of additional email addresses for the contact.

hs_analytics_revenue.title: Hs Analytics Revenue
hs_analytics_revenue.description: Revenue attributed to this contact through HubSpot's analytics or e-commerce integrations. This is often a sum of closed-won deal amounts associated with the contact.

notes_last_contacted.title: Notes Last Contacted
notes_last_contacted.description: The date and time the contact was last contacted, based on logged activities like calls, emails, or meetings. UTC timestamp in milliseconds. This is a read-only property; attempting to set it will be ignored.

num_associated_deals.title: Num Associated Deals
num_associated_deals.description: The total number of deals currently associated with this contact.

first_conversion_date.title: First Conversion Date
first_conversion_date.description: The date and time of the contact's first conversion (e.g., form submission). UTC timestamp.

hs_analytics_last_url.title: Hs Analytics Last Url
hs_analytics_last_url.description: The last URL on your website that the contact visited.

num_conversion_events.title: Num Conversion Events
num_conversion_events.description: The total number of conversion events (e.g., form submissions, CTA clicks) attributed to this contact.

hs_analytics_first_url.title: Hs Analytics First Url
hs_analytics_first_url.description: The first URL on your website that the contact visited.

recent_conversion_date.title: Recent Conversion Date
recent_conversion_date.description: The date and time of the contact's most recent conversion event. UTC timestamp.

recent_deal_close_date.title: Recent Deal Close Date
recent_deal_close_date.description: The close date of the most recent closed-won deal associated with this contact. UTC timestamp in milliseconds.

first_deal_created_date.title: First Deal Created Date
first_deal_created_date.description: The date and time when the first deal was created for this contact. UTC timestamp.

hs_analytics_num_visits.title: Hs Analytics Num Visits
hs_analytics_num_visits.description: The total number of sessions (visits) the contact has had on your website.

webinareventlastupdated.title: Webinareventlastupdated
webinareventlastupdated.description: Timestamp of the last update related to a webinar event (e.g., GoToWebinar) for this contact, if integrated. UTC timestamp.

notes_next_activity_date.title: Notes Next Activity Date
notes_next_activity_date.description: The date and time of the next scheduled activity (e.g., task, meeting) with the contact. UTC timestamp in milliseconds.

hs_all_accessible_team_ids.title: Hs All Accessible Team Ids
hs_all_accessible_team_ids.description: A semicolon-separated list of HubSpot Team IDs that have access to this contact record.

hs_analytics_last_referrer.title: Hs Analytics Last Referrer
hs_analytics_last_referrer.description: The last referring URL that brought the contact to your website before their most recent session.

hs_analytics_source_data_1.title: Hs Analytics Source Data 1
hs_analytics_source_data_1.description: Additional detail for the source. For 'Organic search', this might be the search engine. For 'Paid social', this could be the social media platform.

hs_analytics_source_data_2.title: Hs Analytics Source Data 2
hs_analytics_source_data_2.description: Further detail for the source. For 'Organic search', this might be the keyword. For 'Paid social', this could be the campaign name.

hubspot_owner_assigneddate.title: Hubspot Owner Assigneddate
hubspot_owner_assigneddate.description: The date and time when a HubSpot owner was most recently assigned to this contact. UTC timestamp in milliseconds.

first_conversion_event_name.title: First Conversion Event Name
first_conversion_event_name.description: The name or identifier of the event that marked the contact's first conversion.

hs_analytics_first_referrer.title: Hs Analytics First Referrer
hs_analytics_first_referrer.description: The first referring URL that brought the contact to your website.

hs_analytics_last_timestamp.title: Hs Analytics Last Timestamp
hs_analytics_last_timestamp.description: Timestamp of the contact's last recorded interaction (e.g., last website visit, form submission). UTC timestamp.

hs_analytics_num_page_views.title: Hs Analytics Num Page Views
hs_analytics_num_page_views.description: The total number of pages viewed by the contact on your website.

associatedcompanylastupdated.title: Associatedcompanylastupdated
associatedcompanylastupdated.description: The timestamp of the last update to the primary associated company. This is a read-only property.

hs_analytics_first_timestamp.title: Hs Analytics First Timestamp
hs_analytics_first_timestamp.description: Timestamp of the contact's first recorded interaction (e.g., first website visit). UTC timestamp.

num_unique_conversion_events.title: Num Unique Conversion Events
num_unique_conversion_events.description: The number of unique types of conversion events completed by the contact.

recent_conversion_event_name.title: Recent Conversion Event Name
recent_conversion_event_name.description: The name or identifier of the contact's most recent conversion event.

surveymonkeyeventlastupdated.title: Surveymonkeyeventlastupdated
surveymonkeyeventlastupdated.description: Timestamp of the last update related to a SurveyMonkey event for this contact, if integrated. UTC timestamp.

engagements_last_meeting_booked.title: Engagements Last Meeting Booked
engagements_last_meeting_booked.description: Timestamp of the last meeting booked with the contact through HubSpot's meetings tool.

hs_analytics_average_page_views.title: Hs Analytics Average Page Views
hs_analytics_average_page_views.description: The average number of pages viewed by the contact per session on your website, tracked by HubSpot analytics.

hs_all_assigned_business_unit_ids.title: Hs All Assigned Business Unit Ids
hs_all_assigned_business_unit_ids.description: A semicolon-separated list of Business Unit IDs assigned to this contact, if using HubSpot's Business Units feature.

hs_analytics_last_visit_timestamp.title: Hs Analytics Last Visit Timestamp
hs_analytics_last_visit_timestamp.description: Timestamp of the contact's most recent visit to your website. UTC timestamp.

hs_analytics_first_visit_timestamp.title: Hs Analytics First Visit Timestamp
hs_analytics_first_visit_timestamp.description: Timestamp of the contact's first visit to your website. UTC timestamp.

hs_analytics_num_event_completions.title: Hs Analytics Num Event Completions
hs_analytics_num_event_completions.description: The total number of HubSpot custom events completed by the contact.

engagements_last_meeting_booked_medium.title: Engagements Last Meeting Booked Medium
engagements_last_meeting_booked_medium.description: The medium (e.g., 'Meetings Tool', 'Email') through which the last meeting was booked.

engagements_last_meeting_booked_source.title: Engagements Last Meeting Booked Source
engagements_last_meeting_booked_source.description: The source (e.g., 'SALES', 'MARKETING') of the last meeting booked.

engagements_last_meeting_booked_campaign.title: Engagements Last Meeting Booked Campaign
engagements_last_meeting_booked_campaign.description: The HubSpot campaign ID (GUID) associated with the last meeting booked.

hs_analytics_last_touch_converting_campa.title: Hs Analytics Last Touch Converting Campaign
hs_analytics_last_touch_converting_campa.description: The HubSpot campaign ID (GUID) of the campaign that led to the contact's most recent conversion.

hs_analytics_first_touch_converting_camp.title: Hs Analytics First Touch Converting Campaign
hs_analytics_first_touch_converting_camp.description: The HubSpot campaign ID (GUID) of the campaign that led to the contact's first conversion.

objectType.title: Object Type

properties.title: Properties

TypesRequest

to__id.title: To  Id

items.description: An association for the new CRM object, detailing the target object's ID and the type of association.

associations.title: Associations

tools.name: HUBSPOT_CREATE_DEAL

amount.title: Amount

dealname.title: Dealname
examples: New Website Project for Acme Corp
dealname.description: Descriptive name or title of the deal.

pipeline.title: Pipeline
pipeline.description: ID of the sales pipeline for this deal (required).

closedate.title: Closedate
closedate.description: Date (YYYY-MM-DD) or datetime (ISO 8601) when the deal closed or is expected to close.

dealstage.title: Dealstage
dealstage.description: ID of the deal's current stage in its pipeline.

description.title: Description
examples: Initial discussion with client about their needs for a new CRM system.
Follow-up meeting scheduled to discuss proposal details.
description.description: Detailed text description of the deal.

hs_campaign.title: Hs Campaign
hs_campaign.description: GUID of the HubSpot campaign that generated this deal.

items.title: AssociationsRequest
TypesRequest

associationTypeId.title: Association Type Id

associationCategory.title: Association Category
associationCategory.description: A categorization of the association type. The available categories are `HUBSPOT_DEFINED`, `USER_DEFINED`, and `INTEGRATOR_DEFINED`.

items.description: Defines the type of association between CRM objects.

types.title: Types
types.description: List of association types to be created, each defining category and type ID.

to__id.title: To  Id
to__id.description: ID of the CRM object (e.g., contact, company) to associate with.

items.description: Specifies associations with other CRM objects.

associations.title: Associations
associations.description: Associations to create between the new deal and other CRM objects (e.g., contact, company).

hs_is_closed.title: Hs Is Closed
hs_is_closed.description: Indicates if deal is closed ('true'/'false'; read-only, from deal stage properties).

hs_next_step.title: Hs Next Step
examples: Schedule follow-up call for next week
hs_next_step.description: Next planned step for this deal.

hs_object_id.title: Hs Object Id
hs_object_id.description: Unique ID of the deal object (read-only, HubSpot-assigned).

days_to_close.title: Days To Close
days_to_close.description: Days between creation and close (read-only, HubSpot-calculated).

hs_createdate.title: Hs Createdate
hs_createdate.description: Specific date/time deal record created (ISO 8601, read-only, HubSpot-set).

hs_all_team_ids.title: Hs All Team Ids
hs_all_team_ids.description: Semicolon-separated list of all associated team IDs (owner's primary, additional teams; typically read-only).

hs_all_owner_ids.title: Hs All Owner Ids
hs_all_owner_ids.description: Semicolon-separated list of all owner IDs (primary, co-owners).

hubspot_owner_id.title: Hubspot Owner Id
hubspot_owner_id.description: ID of the HubSpot user owning the deal; may be auto-assigned if unspecified.

closed_won_reason.title: Closed Won Reason
closed_won_reason.description: Reason why the deal was won.

custom_properties.title: Custom Properties
custom_properties.description: Custom properties for the deal. Keys are internal property names, values are the values to set. E.g., `{'internal_name_1': 'value1'}`.

closed_lost_reason.title: Closed Lost Reason
closed_lost_reason.description: Reason why the deal was lost.

deal_currency_code.title: Deal Currency Code
deal_currency_code.description: Currency code (e.g., USD) for deal amount; defaults to company's home currency.

hs_analytics_source.title: Hs Analytics Source
hs_analytics_source.description: Original deal source per HubSpot analytics (e.g., 'Organic Search'; typically read-only).

hs_lastmodifieddate.title: Hs Lastmodifieddate
hs_lastmodifieddate.description: Date/time deal last modified (ISO 8601, read-only, HubSpot-updated).

hs_projected_amount.title: Hs Projected Amount
hs_projected_amount.description: Projected deal amount (manually set or calculated).

amount_in_home_currency.title: Amount In Home Currency
amount_in_home_currency.description: Deal's value in company's home currency (read-only, HubSpot-calculated).

hs_forecast_probability.title: Hs Forecast Probability
hs_forecast_probability.description: Sales forecasting probability; may differ from 'hs_deal_stage_probability'.

hs_deal_stage_probability.title: Hs Deal Stage Probability
hs_deal_stage_probability.description: Win probability (decimal, e.g., 0.5) based on current stage; typically stage-defined.

hs_all_accessible_team_ids.title: Hs All Accessible Team Ids
hs_all_accessible_team_ids.description: Semicolon-separated list of team IDs with access (typically read-only).

engagements_last_meeting_booked.title: Engagements Last Meeting Booked
engagements_last_meeting_booked.description: Date/time of last booked meeting for this deal (typically read-only).

hs_all_assigned_business_unit_ids.title: Hs All Assigned Business Unit Ids
hs_all_assigned_business_unit_ids.description: Semicolon-separated list of assigned business unit IDs (for Business Units add-on).

hs_closed_amount_in_home_currency.title: Hs Closed Amount In Home Currency

hs_projected_amount_in_home_currency.title: Hs Projected Amount In Home Currency

engagements_last_meeting_booked_medium.title: Engagements Last Meeting Booked Medium
engagements_last_meeting_booked_medium.description: Medium (e.g., 'Meetings') of last booked meeting (typically read-only).

engagements_last_meeting_booked_source.title: Engagements Last Meeting Booked Source
engagements_last_meeting_booked_source.description: Source (e.g., 'Calendar') of last booked meeting (typically read-only).

engagements_last_meeting_booked_campaign.title: Engagements Last Meeting Booked Campaign
engagements_last_meeting_booked_campaign.description: Campaign ID for the last booked meeting (typically read-only).

tools.name: HUBSPOT_CREATE_DEALS
tools.description: Creates multiple deals in HubSpot CRM; ensure any associated object IDs, deal stages, and pipeline IDs specified are valid and exist within the HubSpot account.

items.title: InputsRequest

properties.title: Properties

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: Total monetary value of the deal.

hs_acv.title: Hs Acv
hs_acv.description: Annual Contract Value (ACV) of the deal.

hs_arr.title: Hs Arr
hs_arr.description: Annual Recurring Revenue (ARR) of the deal.

hs_mrr.title: Hs Mrr
hs_mrr.description: Monthly Recurring Revenue (MRR) of the deal.

hs_tcv.title: Hs Tcv
hs_tcv.description: Total Contract Value (TCV), including one-time and recurring charges.

dealname.title: Dealname
dealname.description: Name or title of the deal. Typically required for creating a new deal.

pipeline.title: Pipeline
pipeline.description: ID or internal name of the sales pipeline this deal belongs to.
